Name: AutoPoolSpecification
SummaryComment: Specifies characteristics for a temporary 'auto pool'. The Batch service will create this auto pool, run all the tasks for the job on it, and by default delete the pool once the job has completed.

Key.Name: AutoPoolIdPrefix
Key.SummaryComment: A prefix to be added to the unique identifier when a pool is automatically created.
Key.RemarksComment: The prefix is optional. If present, it can be up to 20 characters long and must adhere to the usual rules for ids (alphanumeric characters, hyphens and underscores only).

Key.Name: KeepAlive
Key.SummaryComment: Whether to keep the auto pool alive after its <see cref="PoolLifetimeOption"/> expires.

Key.Name: PoolSpecification
Key.SummaryComment: The pool specification for the auto pool.

Key.Name: PoolLifetimeOption
Key.SummaryComment: The minimum lifetime of created auto pools, and how multiple jobs on a schedule are assigned to pools.
Key.RemarksComment: An auto pool may live longer than its PoolLifetimeOption if <see cref="KeepAlive"/> is set.
